titles.title: A concurrent resolution to express the appreciation of the Congress to the City of Philadelphia, the National Park Service, and We the People 200, Inc., for their hospitality during the July 16, 1987, ceremonies commemorating the bicentennial of the Great Compromise.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Voice Vote.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.
Message on Senate action sent to the House.
Referred to Subcommittee on Census and Population.

committee.name: House Post Office and Civil Service
House Post Office and Civil Service

bill.summary: 9/30/1987--Introduced. Expresses the appreciation of the Congress to the City of Philadelphia, the National Park Service, and We the People 200, Inc., for their hospitality during the ceremonies commemorating the bicentennial of the Great Compromise.
